group_1.textRight: …Aren't you the one following me?

group_1.textLeft: Are you really implying this is some kind of@coincidence?!
That's just not possible!
Every store I go to, I run into you!
Where the heck are you trying to go?!

group_1.textRight: The Pink Tapir shop by the train station…
It's a direct retail store for this real famous@chocolate coin brand.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:270000:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Wha…?
…Just like…me?
I can't believe it…@Are you also after their chocolate coins?

group_1.textRight: Oh, I see, so you're also into them.

group_1.textLeft: I'm not just "into" them!
They're the second most delicious chocolate@in the whole universe!

group_1.textRight: …Their chocolate coins have a long shelf life,@so they rarely go on sale.
The limited edition ones, though, are a totally@different story.

group_1.textLeft: Uh huh, since the demand disappears once@Valentine's Day is over.

group_1.textRight: Yep, you've got it.
And if it's like every other year, the sale's@about to start, right?

group_1.textLeft: That's precisely right!

group_1.textRight: Since I'm pressed for time today, I couldn't go@around sampling everything.
So I figured...
I'd try to score some exclusive Valentine's Day@chocolates for cheap.
That's why the top chocolate shop to hit today…
Is obviously the Pink Tapir.

group_1.textLeft: Hm…
I didn't expect you to be so well studied on@Mitakihara's Valentine's Day strategies!
But why did we keep bumping into each other@in the other stores…?

group_1.textRight: Well, if I headed straight there, I'd just end up@with time to kill, yeah?
So I figured I'd stop at a bunch of different@stores and stuff along the way...

group_1.textLeft: …So you were just stopping by places that were@doing bulk candy sales today?

group_1.textRight: Pretty much.
You catch on quick, don't you.
It's still gonna be a while until the chocolate@party at Mami's place.
Since there's so much the downtime,
I'm checking out as many stores as I can!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:270000:effect_emotion_angry_1][se:7218_anger]…We were on the same wavelength!
…Now that I think about it, we left Sugar Plum@together.
If you wanted to maximize your window@shopping opportunities...
And have the Pink Tapir as your last stop…

group_1.textRight: …Isn't this pretty much the only route you@can take?

group_1.textLeft: (For her plan of attack to be the exact same@as mine…)
(She's a chocolate hunter to be reckoned with!)

group_1.textRight: Oh, right, so that business you said you had@to take care of…

group_1.textCenter: Ah, I have some business to attend to.

group_1.textRight: Did you mean lookin' around for stores@with sales?

group_1.textLeft: That's right…
*Sigh* To think that Kyoko had the same idea.

group_1.textCenter: I haven't been to Mitakihara City in a while.
